specialRules.title: Shield Disruptor
description: Each Shield Disruptor hit will knock down two Powerfields, Shadowfields or Void Shields (if only one remains it is knocked down, but the hit does not carry over). In addition, Shield Disruptor hits ignores Deflector Shields and Ion Shields.

unit.name: Slavebringer Assault Boat
unit.notes: May carry up to eight Infantry units without Mounted. Grotesques counts as two units each.
unit.crit: The Slavebringer and all units on board are destroyed.

unit.name: Torture Class Cruiser
unit.notes: May carry up to two Executioner Landing Modules and two Slavebringer Assault Boats, or up to six Slavebringer Assault Boats, plus the troops carried in them.
